---
title: "Shiny Graphs"
output: github_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
inputPanel(
  # bin widget:
  radioButtons("n_bins_1", label = "Number of histogram bins:",
              choices = seq(50,125,by=25), selected = 75),
  # bandwidth widget:
  sliderInput("bw_adjust_1", label = "Density smoother bandwidth adjustment:",
              min = 0.1, max = 2, value = 1, step = 0.1),
  # data widget: selecting the variable 
  selectInput("x_1", label = "Variable:", 
             choices = c("Appearances" ="apps",
                         "Total Goals" = "nGoals",
                         "Total Assists" = "nAssists"))
)
```
